languages.text: {n}Узкое бледное лицо Маражая рассекает глумливая улыбка. Друкари бросает на вас ехидный взгляд.{/n} "Прямо по больному, да?..."
{n}Marazhai's face splits into a grin as he casts you a mocking look.{/n} "A sore spot with you, is it not?"
languages.original_text: {n}Узкое бледное лицо Маражая рассекает глумливая улыбка. Друкари бросает на вас ехидный взгляд.{/n} "Прямо по больному, да?..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's pale narrow face splits into a mocking grin. The Drukhari casts a taunting glance at you.{/n} "Right where it hurts the most, eh?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa a juego con su mirada burlona se extiende por el rostro de Marazhai.{/n} «Te he dado donde duele, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face splits into a grin as he casts you a mocking look.{/n} "A sore spot with you, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa a juego con su mirada burlona se extiende por el rostro de Marazhai.{/n} «Te he dado donde duele, ¿verdad?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、にやりと笑みを浮かべ、あなたを嘲笑うような視線を投げかけた。{/n} 「痛いところを突かれたようだな？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face splits into a grin as he casts you a mocking look.{/n} "A sore spot with you, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、にやりと笑みを浮かべ、あなたを嘲笑うような視線を投げかけた。{/n} 「痛いところを突かれたようだな？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋脸上露出了笑容，向你投来了嘲弄的目光。{/n}“这可戳到你的痛处了，是吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face splits into a grin as he casts you a mocking look.{/n} "A sore spot with you, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋脸上露出了笑容，向你投来了嘲弄的目光。{/n}“这可戳到你的痛处了，是吧？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Gesicht verzerrt sich zu einem Grinsen, während er dir einen spöttischen Blick zuwirft.{/n} "Ein wunder Punkt von Euch, wie?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face splits into a grin as he casts you a mocking look.{/n} "A sore spot with you, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Gesicht verzerrt sich zu einem Grinsen, während er dir einen spöttischen Blick zuwirft.{/n} "Ein wunder Punkt von Euch, wie?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se fend d'un sourire narquois alors qu'il vous jette un regard moqueur.{/n} « Eh bien, dites-moi, vous êtes drôlement {mf|remonté|remontée}, à ce que je vois... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face splits into a grin as he casts you a mocking look.{/n} "A sore spot with you, is it not?"

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzünde bir sırıtış peyda oluyor ve sana alaycı bir şekilde bakıyor.{/n} "Tam da hassas noktan, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face splits into a grin as he casts you a mocking look.{/n} "A sore spot with you, is it not?"
